trans-unit.source: Specifies the type of registration to perform for a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> or <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref> registration.
trans-unit.target: 에 대해 수행 하는 등록의 유형을 지정는 <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> 또는 <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"> </xref> 등록 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Registering an <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication> enables it to receive <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration> invitation requests.

The service or application performing the registration must have permission to do so, as it requires access to the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager> and other resources like users, applications, and services on the remote machine.
trans-unit.target: 서비스 또는 응용 프로그램 등록 수 있는 권한이 있어야,에 대 한 액세스를 해야 하므로 <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager>및 사용자, 응용 프로그램 및 원격 컴퓨터에서 서비스와 같은 다른 리소스.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> or <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref> is being registered for all peers of the application host
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> 또는 <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"> </xref> 응용 프로그램 호스트의 모든 피어에 대해 등록 된

trans-unit.source: The application or object is being registered only for the user associated with the calling peer
trans-unit.target: 호출 피어와 연결 된 사용자에 대해서만 등록 되는 응용 프로그램이 나 개체
